stories.text:
I am trying to understand how to better negotiate equity grants after reading some articles that explore changes to compensation practices, so I wanted to ask the community about their experiences:

- Company stage? Seed, Series A, B, ..., D, etc. - How was it explained to you? Terms, requirements for grant, communicated verbally or written, etc. - If you have experience as founder, executive, or equivalent role in trying to convince the board to approve an equity refresher program, how did it go? Board member awareness of the concept, concerns, etc.

Some of the readings that spurred this question, and for context purposes:

[1, PDF] https://go.gusto.com/rs/110-WOX-868/images/An%20Entrepreneur%E2%80%99s%20Guide%20to%20Employee%20Equity.pdf [2] https://blog.samaltman.com/employee-equity
stories.title: Ask HN: What is your experience with equity refresher grants?

stories.text: I know there have already been many great tools like Zapier and IFTTT for predictable and repetitive workflows. But for many other workflows, the result and call-to-action require human intellect to engage with, for example: for PM or customer service, they have to collect customers' feedback and bug reports (say from discord) to development plan (say kanban in Notion). So I created this demo, check it out and I want to know what HN think: https://twitter.com/superusapp/status/1543985142468726785
stories.title: Ask HN: Create your workflow across apps with drag and drop. what do you think?

stories.text: Hi HN, is there an equivalent of Hacker News that is popular in China?  I'm thinking of tech-focused news sites that have significant influence on the tech scene in China, with discussions, upvotes, etc.  Ideally it would be translatable via Google Translate or have an english language version.
stories.title: Ask HN: Is there an equivalent Hacker News in China?
